author: AP
title: Stepping up: Mets PA announcer offers kind voice amid virus
description: During any other baseball season, Colin Cosell would be at Citi Field rousing the crowd as the public address announcer for the New York Mets
content:
NEW YORK (AP) — The requests come by the hundreds: the son of an emergency room nurse, the husband of a doctor, a hospital patient.
Colin Cosell studies them, sorts them. Normally he’d be at Citi Field, rousing the crowd as public address announcer for the N… [+2850 chars]
